name: MyCareerFitScoop
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My Career Fit Scoop is the best way to stay up-to-date about information related to your career or job search. Gordon Collier, the host, is the founder of the My Career Fit skill, the first voice-activated job search assistant. On The Scoop, Gordon highlights employers that you should check out, which you can learn more about on the My Career Fit skill.

This skill was created using Buildlingo, a Witlingo product. For more, go to: www.witlingo.com/buildlingo
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
